q: How do you protect glass façades from flooding?
a: We install base tracks and removable aluminum panels across the mullions. Transparent polycarbonate infills maintain daylight while sealing against water. See Modular Flood Barrier.

q: Can frameless glass doors be sealed?
a: Yes—compression sill systems use surface gaskets with no drilling into glass. Suitable for showrooms and condos.

q: Do glass façades require special testing?
a: Yes—ASTM E331 water-penetration and E1886 impact tests verify performance under hydrostatic and debris loads.
